content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
// Select all indicators from the table
// Create a new column to identify the type of indicator, IP, Domain, URL, File, or Other
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
// Summarize and order the data, then render the chart
| summarize CountOfIndicators = count() by IndicatorType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by CountOfIndicators desc 
| render barchart kind=stacked
content.title: Indicators imported into Sentinel by indicator type and date

content.query:
SecurityAlert
// Select alerts where the alert rule query includes the threat intelligence data table
| where ExtendedProperties containscs "ThreatIntelligenceIndicator" 
// Summarize and order the data, then render the chart
| summarize CountOfAlerts = count() by AlertSeverity, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by CountOfAlerts desc 
| render barchart kind=stacked
content.title: Alerts generated from threat intelligence by alert severity and date

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator 
| project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Description, Active, IndicatorTime = TimeGenerated, observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId , AlertTime = TimeGenerated
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
 iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
 iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
 iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId, AlertTime;
alertEntity 
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Value = observableValue, ThreatType, Description, Source = SourceSystem
| order by Alerts desc
content.title: Alert counts by indicator

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator 
| where TimeGenerated < now() 
| project IndicatorId, Active, SourceSystem, IndicatorTime = TimeGenerated , observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName)
| summarize arg_min(IndicatorTime, *) by IndicatorId;
// Create a temp table containing all alerts generated from threat intelligence.
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| where TimeGenerated < now()
// | where ExtendedProperties contains "ThreatIntelligenceIndicator" 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId , AlertTime = TimeGenerated
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif((isnotempty(Entities.Address)), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, '.', Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == 'account', strcat(Entities.Name,'@',Entities.UPNSuffix),'')))) 
| where isnotempty(entity)
| project entity, SystemAlertId, AlertTime;
// Join the two temp tables and summarize the data in a table showing indicator sources by detection time and count of alerts.
alertEntity 
| join kind = inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| project SystemAlertId, IndicatorId, timedelta = AlertTime - IndicatorTime, SourceSystem
| summarize DetectionTime=case(toint(avg(timedelta))>0,strcat(replace(@'\-',@'',replace(@'(\:\d+\:\d+\.\d+)',@'',tostring(avg(timedelta)))),' hrs',' DELAYED'),toint(avg(timedelta))<0,strcat(replace(@'\-',@'',replace(@'(\:\d+\:\d+\.\d+)',@'',tostring(avg(timedelta)))),' hrs',' AHEAD'), 'None'), Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Source = SourceSystem
| order by Source asc
| render table
content.title: Average detection time by source
